author: macroforge contributors
description: TypeScript macro expansion engine powered by Rust and SWC
name: macroforge

scripts.build: deno install --node-modules-dir && deno task build:js && deno run -A npm:@napi-rs/cli/napi build --platform --release
scripts.build:js: deno task build:serde && deno task build:traits
scripts.build:serde: deno run -A npm:esbuild js/serde/index.ts --bundle --outfile=js/serde/index.mjs --format=esm && deno run -A npm:typescript/tsc js/serde/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir js/serde --lib ES2024 --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:traits: deno run -A npm:esbuild js/traits/index.ts --bundle --outfile=js/traits/index.mjs --format=esm && deno run -A npm:typescript/tsc js/traits/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir js/traits --lib ES2024 --skipLibCheck
scripts.clean: rm -f macroforge.*.node || true; rm -f pkg/*.node || true; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.cleanbuild: deno task clean && deno task build
